# GraphQL.Play.2.2


# Bind Query
```
query q($input: bind!) {
  bind(input: $input){
    access_token
    authority
    expires_in
    refresh_token
    token_type
  }
}
```
```
{
  "input": {
    "token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vcDdrZXl2YWx1dC52YXVsdC5henVyZS5uZXQva2V5cy9QN0lkZW50aXR5U2VydmVyNFNlbGZTaWduZWQvOGJkZDYxODA3NWQwNGEwZDgzZTk4NmI4YWE5NGQ3YjIiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..MTk1e5iv8X2LVIj2xGv3AEnrMf5EXsBvHDB-zz_AFUs0l_XeK5hPZp5LjzeeSOhSMgoI-ivQxhhe_1FaGwyEXBrU1NQJsPrFBhFuhMizB58yHlRfy_v8A1XyrKVQD2dDUWAyJQYfkNJHnisQnn1TIzTm0UcY-uB8pftNvoxB5GWFGzGw3vWzfz7QPxp7alIkO25YviywkNZAQTLzk_-Xw4F0cDBPCC8SDOdbeHgoJtx5QkNcXW2o9i372hBu3POUVNRKDS5w_eF-fy3S4mGy-tTI1xqTERVyyr7z9tsjabKrfkoMrvdjmUyQrrhNdin6GIIF6L8MOZ9Y2bfflnAfUw",
    "tokenScheme": "oidc",
    "authorityKey": "p7identityserver4"
  }
}
```
Produces...
```
{
  "data": {
    "bind": {
      "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vcDdrZXl2YWx1dC52YXVsdC5henVyZS5uZXQva2V5cy9QN0lkZW50aXR5U2VydmVyNFNlbGZTaWduZWQvOGJkZDYxODA3NWQwNGEwZDgzZTk4NmI4YWE5NGQ3YjIiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..Xxo1QQ3RZSKEhyCXdIrDGCRh_sgprqlw8sk0ySFARxn9prIl4zVTV23n3D2ZstNMfdvOnbApQqoepQe-fEcdy7xOaKWdWEoutxz09HgahF-ngRD-6gHwbmpQBpawrQqCe28u7Dr8aQ468i9cmMi2Kl6oHTWEgzNUPQCEc1C6u9lDdYXeYzBXPVs92bCk1jbPjcWL15C0oNLO6_J3Pw0pwln32Ml0UmG-9OURw_4KzFtxrEMxixkFlv13WgH3gHp6hRc9i8537qI4B6T6X35ilGdrceNWbzV-ze0qRk1tpHBTWYpkr6J09gF8oLifOmGdDkjC42vzeSoxz7r0XBBKvw",

      "expires_in": 3600,
```
